attributes.action: make grants avaliable for all u k subjects to install "green energy"systems on/in their property to avoid using nuclear power and to help save OUR planet as the sun gives us free energy for ever
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: grants to be made for u k citizens to install solar power heating and energy provision so we do not rely on other countries to provide our power and we remain indipendant and do not use nuclear energy as this cannot be desposed of safley exept to be used to arm wepons to kill
